definition: Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
surname Gong
to offer tribute/tribute/gifts
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
pinyin: Gong4 shan1 Du2 long2 zu2 Nu4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 贡山独龙族怒族自治县

sentences.english: This essay argues that the name originated from the Wa people, and Goligong is the very Kunlun Mountain in history.
sentences.chinese: 同时认为，高黎贡山就是我国历史上所说的昆仑山。

sentences.english: The electric power and communication are not completely restored in Gongshan of Yunnan, and the disaster scene is lack of rescue machines.
sentences.chinese: 现在，云南贡山的电力和通讯还没有完全恢复。

sentences.english: Gaoligong Mountains is an area that spans the border of Yunnan Province in China and Myanmar.
sentences.chinese: 黎贡山是云南与缅甸北部交界的山脉。

sentences.english: Mount Gaoligong is a southern extension on the east side of the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 高黎贡山是喜马拉雅山脉的东部南延部分。

sentences.english: The forests of Gaoligongshan are home to some of China's rarest wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 高黎贡山的森林是中国部分珍稀动物的家园。
